text: Brandon James Cooper (born 14 January 2000) is a Welsh professional footballer who plays as a centre back for League Two side Newport County, on loan from Championship club Swansea City. He is a Wales Under-21 international. ==Career== ===Swansea City=== Cooper has been at Swansea since the age of 6. He played for the Swansea under-18s and under-23s then signed a professional contract extension in March 2018. He was handed his debut for Swansea on 28 August 2018 in a 1–0 defeat to Crystal Palace in the EFL Cup. On 7 February 2020, Cooper joined National League side Yeovil Town on loan until the end of the 2019–20 season. On 7 September 2020, Cooper joined League Two side Newport County on a season-long loan. He made his debut for Newport on 8 September 2020 in the starting line up for the 1-0 EFL Trophy defeat to Cheltenham Town.Cooper Newport debut He made his football league debut on 12 September 2020 as a half time substitute for Matt Dolan in the 1-1 draw for Newport County against Scunthorpe United on the first day of the 2020-21 League Two season.Taylor Cooper league debut ==Career statistics== {| class=wikitable style="text-align: center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan=2|Club !rowspan=2|Season !colspan=3|League !colspan=2|FA Cup !colspan=2|EFL Cup !colspan=2|Other !colspan=2|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan=4|Swansea City |2018–19 |Championship |0||0||0||0||1||0||colspan=2|—||1||0 |- |2019–20 |Championship |0||0||1||0||0||0||colspan=2|—||1||0 |- |2020–21 |Championship |0||0||0||0||0||0||colspan=2|—||0||0 |- !colspan=2|Total !0||0||1||0||1||0||colspan=2|—||2||0 |- |Swansea City U23 |2018–19 |colspan=3|—||colspan=2|—||colspan=2|—||2||0||2||0 |- |Yeovil Town (loan) |2019–20 |National League |3||0||colspan=2|—||colspan=2|—||0||0||3||0 |- |Newport County (loan) |2020–21 |League Two |6||0||0||0||3||0||2||0||10||0 |- !colspan=3|Career total !9||0||1||0||4||0||4||0||17||0 |} ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Bridgend Category:Wales youth international footballers Category:Wales under-21 international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Swansea City A.F.C. players Category:Yeovil Town F.C. players Category:Newport County A.F.C. players Category:National League (English football) players Category:English Football League players Category:Welsh footballers
